summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of portions of Blocks 1 and 2, Wilcox's Addition; portions of Block 1, Windermere Heights Addition; portions of Blocks 2 and 3, Bonen's Addition; and certain unplatted property in Section 6, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M.; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-180 and 17-130, respectively.
